translation.note: This is displayed when the application first starts to let the user know we're loading.
Option to continue displaying a combination progress/information dialog after its already finished its action (so you can read the information).
translation.variant: Manténgalo abierto una finalizada la inicialización.

translation.note: A menu item that is displayed in many different fields when right clicked. Selected this option displays context-sensitive help about the field.
Menu item for reopening previously opened files
Menu item that clears the list of recent files to reopen

translation.variant: Esta aplicación no utiliza archivos .eiw. El archivo importado se guardará sólo como un archivo .equipment.

translation.note: Text for a checkbox that allows the user to hide this message, so they won't see it again. This is for 'FYI' messages that could get annoying.
translation.variant: No volver a mostrar este mensaje.
Corte la selección actual en el portapapeles.
Copie la selección actual en el portapapeles.
Cierre el programa de control actual.
Imprima el programa de control actual.
Editar propiedades comunes a varios microbloques en formato de tabla.
Muestre la paleta de colores y modelos.
Cree un nuevo programa de control vacío.

translation.note: warning that you cannot edit the just-opened file. Saving it to a different name will unlock it.
translation.variant: El archivo ''{0}'' está bloqueado. Si desea editarlo, debe guardarlo con un nombre distinto.

translation.note: Warning the you cannot edit the just-opened file. You must unlock it first.
translation.variant: El archivo ''{0}'' está bloqueado. Para desbloquearlo, haga clic en el icono de candado de la barra de estado para poder realizar cualquier cambio.

translation.note: This is for building and rebuilding object instances on the Protocol Mapping Tool window.
Find values.
This clears the selected row's object instance in the Protocol Mapping Tool..

translation.variant: El archivo .ini se ha importado correctamente.
Los valores de elección deben ser únicos. Este es un valor reservado.

translation.note: a generic button to cancel an action and/or throw away changes
a generic button to approve an action and/or keep changes.
a message displayed on a panel to tell the user that a saving step is in progress
a message displayed on a panel to tell the user where the file was saved to
The option in OCLBuilder to create a new control program
The option in OCLBuilder to open an existing control program
Just general text when we need to reference the type of files LogicBuilder creates and edits to the user. Used in several places in different contexts.
Abbreviation for a rectangle

translation.variant: Mover las propiedades seleccionadas a otra ficha
Escribir el nombre de la ficha para mover las propiedades a
Agrupar componentes seleccionados en una sola fila
Dividir la fila seleccionada en sus componentes individuales
Ver las propiedades de la propiedad compuesta seleccionada
Nombre de referencia de la plantilla
Agregar una nueva categoría de horario de Reloj
Eliminar categoría de horario de Reloj de hora
Nombre de referencia de la categoría
Agregar categoría de horario de Reloj
Agregar nueva categoría de horario de Reloj de estado múltiple
Eliminar categoría de horario de Reloj de hora de estado múltiple
Nombre de referencia de categoría de horario de estado múltiple
Agregar nueva categoría de horario de Reloj de estado múltiple
Agregar nueva categoría de horario de Horario modelado
Eliminar categoría de horario de Horario modelado
Nombre de referencia de categoría de horario
Agregar categoría de horario de Horario modelado

translation.note: Header for the combo sensor/rnet tags. 'tags' are unique numbers used by special sensors to store variables.

translation.variant: Nombre de visualización de etiqueta Rnet

translation.note: Header for options to import and export the custom Sensor Tags that are being edited on this page
translation.variant: Importar/exportar todas las etiquetas Rnet personalizadas
Importe todas las opciones de categoría de alarma/horario de un archivo.
Exporte todas las opciones de categoría de alarma/horario de un archivo.
Convertir EIKON para archivos de WebCTRL
Error en la actualización del archivo {0}. Este archivo está dañado o falta su firma.
Se ha producido un error al leer el archivo: {0}
El archivo {0} tiene una firma no válida. El archivo está dañado o se ha modificado manualmente.
Nombre de referencia de la categoría
Grabar el grupo actual como una plantilla
Cambiar nombre del grupo de propiedades actual

translation.note: menu item that allows the user to add, remove, and rename Program Defaults (value set) identifiers.
Title of the dialog that allows the user to add, remove, and rename Program Defaults (value set) identifiers.
this is the header for the 'name' field of a Program Default (value set) being edited
this is the header for the 'description' field of a Program Defaults (value set) being edited
The title of a dialog for editing details about a Program Defaults (value set). This is used for both adding a new value set and editing an existing one, so the text is fairly generic.
This is the initial name of a new set of Program Defaults (value set) we create when a user adds one. They'll probably rename it, but we have to call it something.
This is displayed if the user adds or renames a Program Defaults (value set) name to something that isn't unique. Their names must be unique.
translation.variant: Los nombres de los valores predeterminados del programa deben ser únicos.

translation.note: Title of a the warning dialog when the user enters an invalid Program Defaults (value set).
translation.variant: Error de valores predeterminados del programa

translation.note: Tooltip for a button that adds new Program Defaults (value sets)
translation.variant: Agregar nuevo conjunto de valores predeterminados del programa

translation.note: tooltip for a button that removes a Program Defaults (value set).
translation.variant: Eliminar conjunto de valores predeterminados del programa

translation.note: tooltip for a button that allows you to edit the name and description of a Program Defaults (value set).
translation.variant: Editar propiedades de valores predeterminados del programa

translation.note: this is a checkbox name for an option to make this value set metric (vs imperial)

translation.variant: Graba el programa de control actual.

translation.note: Denotes demand level for energy consumption
Denotes demand level for energy consumption
Denotes demand level for energy consumption
Indicates when a building is normally not in use and is vacant
this is the header for list of 'program defaults' (value sets) so you can check off which ones you want to keep.
translation.variant: Valores predeterminados del programa para importar:

translation.note: when you do a merge (copy/paste, insert symbol) where the source has Program Defaults (value sets) than the destination, we'll ask you which ones do want to keep.
translation.variant: Acaba de insertar lógica que contiene varios valores predeterminados del programa. Seleccione cuáles quiere importar.

translation.note: Title for the palette dialog window

translation.variant: Buscar la propiedad seleccionada en el árbol.

translation.note: For closing an open dialog
the title of the dialog where you edit properties.
Key for font styles
Key for bold font style
Key for italized font style

translation.variant: Introducir un nuevo nombre de grupo de propiedades
Introducir un nuevo nombre de propiedad

translation.note: the zoom menu
The file/open menu item
copy menu item (part of cut, copy, paste)
Cut menu item (part of cut, copy, paste)
paste menu item (part of cut, copy, paste)
menu item to move selected figures on top of everything else
menu item to move selected figures one step closer to being on top of everything else
menu item to move selected figures to be behind (on bottom of) everything else
menu item to move selected figures one step further backward (towards the bottom)
menu item to display a dialog that shows all usages of a label.
menu item to scroll to the input of a label or wire.
menu item that highlights all wires and labels in a single connection. It does NOT go through microblocks.
button that clears the current highlighted connection.
button that allows the user to change the highlighted connection's color.
menu item to step inside a multiblock. A multiblock is a control program inside a microblock (that's inside a control program). This allows you to edit the multiblock's contents.
menu item to step outside of a multiblock. So you go to the multiblock's parent (a control program or possibly another multiblock)
Menu item to add a new empty multiblock
Menu item to add a new empty secure multiblock
Menu item that displays a dialog allowing the user to select an existing multiblock to add to the control program
Menu item that displays a dialog allowing the user to select an existing secure multiblock to add to the control program
menu item to unlock a locked multiblock. A multiblock may be locked by signing it, which makes it read only unless the lock is removed.
Warning message given to users to indicate that they are removing a special tag placed on the microblock that allows it's use in a zone control module.
translation.variant: Al desbloquear este micro bloque se eliminarán las etiquetas ZN. ¿Desea continuar?

translation.note: Warning message given to users to indicate that they are removing a special tag placed on the microblock that allows it's use in a zone control module.
Tooltip text to let the user know that a microblock has been signed for use in a zone control module.
translation.variant: Este micro bloque se ha etiquetado para usarlo en un programa de control compilado ZN.

translation.note: Find/Replace menu item. Peforms a search and allows you to replace found items with something else.
Find menu item. Peforms a search only (no replace).
Title of dialog for showing text not found.
Message shown when text in a find search wasn't found.
translation.variant: El texto ''{0}'' no fue encontrado en ''{1}''.

translation.note: a heading for a list of all microblocks

translation.variant: Editar la definición de visualización de propiedades del micro bloque seleccionado

translation.note: the menu to select the current microblock palette (a different type of menu for selecting microblocks).
menu item that toggles magnetism on or off. Magnetism makes figures snap to a grid. Microblocks, labels, and wires are not affected by this as magnetism is always ON for them.
translation.variant: Ajustar figuras y texto a la cuadrícula

translation.note: menu item that toggles highlighting BACnet objects
menu item to toggle metric or american standard support
tooltip over a button that displays a menu allowing you to set the current compile (make) type.
translation.variant: Le permite seleccionar la forma de crear este Programa de control.

translation.note: toggle for suppressing the logic page generation when compiled.
Toggle for settting the 'Use Unitary Naming' flag.
menu option to display information about the control program
menu item to print the control program
Title of the third party editor dialog window
menu item to edit mapping properties to third party protocols
menu item to edit properties common among many microclocks

translation.variant: Asignar propiedades de BACnet a protocolos de terceros en formato de tabla.

translation.note: menu item to save the control program as a symbol
menu item to insert a symbol from a file into the control program
menu item to import an EIKON eiw file
menu item to export the control program to a legacy equipment file
menu item that starts simulating the current control program
name of a menu with a sub menu for compiling the control program. The sub menu specifies which type of module to compile the CP for.. This directly relates to how you validate it.
name of a menu with a sub menu for validating the control program. The sub menu specifies which type of module to validate the CP for. This directly relates to how you compile it.
This is the title on a dialog that lists errors and warnings.
The text for a menu item to display the errors and warnings dialog.
tooltip for a button or menu item to display the errors and warnings dialog.
translation.variant: Muestra los errores del programa de control actual

translation.note: tooltip for a button or that runs the simulator.
translation.variant: Simule el programa de control actual

translation.note: menu item to display the application's preferences dialog.
The title for the preferences dialog.
The title for the general preferences
The title for the fonts preferences tab
column header for a table of languages
column header for a table of font names
column header for a table of font sizes
menu item that displays a dialog that simulatenously shows all selected microblocks' properties. It only shows the ones they have in common.

translation.variant: Editor de propiedades comunes entre microbloques

translation.note: This is a table header tool tip
translation.variant: Hacer doble clic en el encabezado de columna para ordenar
Comparar las propiedades de los objetos seleccionados
La selección no tiene propiedades comunes que ver.

translation.note: This is description text before a list of microblocks that have been merged (via copy/paste or import symbol) and have conflicting reference names.
translation.variant: Los siguientes micro bloques insertados tienen nombres de referencia conflictivos. Los nombres de referencia no se han creado automáticamente porque se han definido de forma específica.

translation.note: The title of the merge conflict dialog: after a merge is completed, if conflicting reference names exist, we show the user a list of them.
the title of a generic error dialog.
the name of a tab on an error dialog that displays the summary of the error. This is the error that is suitable for the end user.
the name of a tab on an error dialog that displays the details of the error. This is NOT suitable for a user and is for developers only.
checkbox on the export to symbol file chooser that allows you to export only the selected items or everything.
checkbox on the export to symbol file chooser that allows you add it to the favorites after it is exported.
Dialog title when we ask the user if they want to overwrite a file or not?
Option that specifies the user want to overwrite an existing file.
option that specifies a user does NOT want to overwrite a file, but wants to select a different file.
Option that specifies a user does NOT want to overwrite a file, but that they want to cancel the save altogether.
Prompt to ask the user what to do when a file already exists. They'll be given three options: overwrite, select another file, or cancel.
Message to the user when they try to save a file that its read-only and they must choose another.
translation.variant: El archivo ''{0}'' es de solo lectura. Seleccione otro distinto.

translation.note: Message to the user when they try to save a file that was locked when opened. They cannot save it with the same file name and must rename it.
translation.variant: El archivo ''{0}'' está bloqueado y no se puede reemplazar. Seleccione otro nombre de archivo.

translation.note: Message that is displayed when the user tries to save to a file that we already have open. They must either close the target file first and then save (choosing to overwrite it) or select another target file.
translation.variant: El archivo ''{0}'' está abierto. Ciérrelo primero o seleccione otro archivo.

translation.note: Message given after a find source action when there is no source.
translation.variant: No se ha encontrado el origen.

translation.note: Message given after a find usages action when there is no usages.
The title of a dialog that displays the results of a find usages or go to source search. This is not the same as the results of a regular find. FYI.
context menu item when a microblock is selected that allows you select a property that will show up on Graphics. ViewBuilder uses this to aid view creation.
Dialog title for selecting a property (or properties) from a single microblock to show up on a graphic.
Dialog title for adding/editing a comment for a property for graphics.
Menu item that displays all properties in a control program that show up on Graphics. ViewBuilder uses this to aid view creation.
Dialog title for displaying a list of all properties in a control program (not just microblock) that show up on a graphic.

label 'comments' that the user can enter that will be visible in ViewBuilder. These comments are instruction or misc stuff that the graphic's creator needs to know about and are for the entire control program.
tooltip for the edit comments button (which is only an image).
translation.variant: Edite los comentarios de la propiedad seleccionada. Estos comentarios estarán visibles en ViewBuilder.

translation.note: tootlip for a button that removes the selected graphics properties.
menu for multiblock-related functions.
Title for the dialog where the user selects an existing multiblock to add from a list.
Menu item to edit the property page editor.
a percentage sign. Used for things like zoom level (100%, 200%)
Menu item that starts the EquipmentBuilder (one word cannot be translated).
Menu item that allows you to edit the shape of the selected item.
Menu item that allows you to edit the order in which items appear on an Rnet sensor's menu.
Title of the dialog that allows you to edit the order in which items appear on an external sensor.
Menu item that allows you to edit the order in which items appear on the property page.
Menu item that allows you to edit the order in which items appear on the property page. This version will select the currently focused microblock in the edit order dialog after it is displayed.
Title of the dialog that allows you to edit the order in which items appear on the property page.
tooltip for edit order. Specifies that you can select multiple items to change their order.
tooltip for edit order. Specifies that you can select multiple items to change their order.
tooltip for cutting things in edit order. First you cut them then you paste them.
translation.variant: Corta los elementos seleccionados. A continuación, puede pegarlos donde desee colocarlos.

translation.note: tooltip for pasting things in edit order. First you cut them then you paste them.
Tooltip explaining that this button will let you edit the property page text for the select item.
translation.variant: Editar el texto de la pagina de propiedades de los elementos seleccionados

translation.note: Tooltip to explain that this button allows you to perform a search within the list.
translation.variant: Busca los elementos en la lista.

translation.note: checkbox that allows you to search from the start of a list of items (vs from the current selection).
Tooltip to explain that this button gives you context sensitive help.
Title of the dialog that allows you to edit information about a control program.
'yes' as an answer to a question. Usually apart of yes/no or yes/no/cancel and sometimes yes/yes to all/no/no to all/cancel
'yes to all' as an answer to a question. Part of yes/yes to all/no/no to all/cancel
'no' as an answer to a question. Usually apart of yes/no or yes/no/cancel and sometimes yes/yes to all/no/no to all/cancel
'no to all' as an answer to a question. Part of yes/yes to all/no/no to all/cancel
Prompt to save a modified flag that occurs when you close the file (or application) without saving it.
translation.variant: Este programa de control se ha modificado. ¿Desea grabar los cambios?

translation.note: Title of the dialog to prompt the user to save a modified flag that occurs when you close the file (or application) without saving it.
messages telling the user how many actions will be undone. This is used when 0 or multiple actions are selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be undone. This is used when only 1 action is selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be redone. This is used when 0 or multiple actions are selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be redone. This is used when only 1 action is selected.
Description on a progress dialog informing the user that a specific control program is being opened. The variable may be a file name or a generic name since this may be one downloaded from online.
description on a progress dialog informing the user that a specific control program is being opened. The variable may be a file name or a generic name since this may be one downloaded from online.
description on a progress dialog informing the user that a specific control program is being made. The variable may be a file name or a generic name since this may be one downloaded from online.
Title for a progress dialog informing the user that 'making a control program' is being performed.
Title for a dialog that tells the user that a control program is being opened.
Title for a dialog that tells the user that something is being pasted. This is only shown for long paste operations.
Title for a general progress dialog when a file is being saved.
Title for a general progress dialog when a control program is being simulated.
Description for a general progress dialog when a control program is being simulated. Lets the user know what control program is being simulated.
menu item that says whether the property editor is a floating dialog or a docked panel.
menu item that selects all items in the current view.
menu item that adds a new joint to a wire so you can edit its shape.
menu item that adds an existing joint from a wire.
Warning message that the file name is illegal. This occurs when the user saves a control program. This will be followed by a more-specific reason why it is invalid.
translation.variant: El nombre de archivo no es válido.

translation.note: If the user saves a file to an invalid name, one main reason is it may have spaces. This is the text for a check box giving them the option to convert spaces to underscores automatically for file names.
translation.variant: Convertir espacios en subrayado automáticamente al guardar

translation.note: Checkbox option for creating new control programs as metric vs imperial
translation.variant: Crear nuevos programas de control como métricos

translation.note: Header for the section about importing EMS.ini.
This explains to a user why they want to use this feature that imports settings from the app that LogicBuilder replaces.
translation.variant: Esto importa la información de categoría de programación desde un EMS.ini de una instalación de EIKON para WebCTRL. La operación debe realizarse una sola vez.

translation.note: Header for the section about importing/exporting template and category choices.
The text for the menu item that launches the execution order wizard.
translation.variant: Asistente para el orden de ejecución

translation.note: Title for an advance dialog that allows a user to determine which microblock is executed next in a loopback situation.
translation.variant: Asistente para el orden de ejecución

translation.note: The message that appears when the execution order wizard first starts.
translation.variant: Este asistente le permite elegir el micro bloque de prioridad más alta que desea ejecutar cuando se produzca una situación de bucle invertido.

translation.note: A message asking the user if they wish to save the execution order they just created.
translation.variant: ¿Desea guardar su lista de prioridades de ejecución de micro bloques? Puede volver a ejecutar el asistente cuando lo desee para seleccionar una nueva lista. Pulse Cancelar para abortar.

translation.note: A dialog that allows you to add and remove files that are stored inside our source file. These files are for internationalization and certain customizations.
Menu item to allow the user to set the control program's execution rate in milliseconds.

translation.variant: Defina la velocidad de ejecución para el programa de control en milisegundos.

translation.note: Menu item to dislay the bundled resources dialog
This explains what the 'droplist choices' panel does on LogicBuilder's configuration dialog.
translation.variant: Aquí puede activar las opciones utilizadas frecuentemente para que aparezcan en listas desplegables de campos de micro bloques específicos (como tipos de unidades o de activador). Esto permite simplificar las opciones visibles.

translation.note: This is a header for a tab on a color chooser dialog that shows blocks of colors (swatches) that a user can pick.

translation.variant: Está asumiendo la propiedad de un archivo cuyo acceso ha adquirido a través de una clave con fecha de vencimiento. ¿Está seguro de que quiere continuar?

translation.note: This is the name of a context menu item that marks the selected field as read-only.
This is the name of a context menu item that marks the selected field as modifiable (the opposite of the mark as read-only item).
This is the name of a menu item that displays a dialog that allows you to import BACnet addresses from discovered third party devices. You can then push those addresses into selected microblocks.
Name of the menu item allowing you to unlock control programs.

translation.variant: Está a punto de eliminar la seguridad de su microbloque seguro. ¿Seguro que desea continuar?

translation.note: The first step to adding an arc figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar arco: haga clic donde desee que se encuentre el centro del arco (como si el arco fuera un círculo).

translation.note: The second step to adding an arc figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar arco: haga clic donde desee que comience el arco.

translation.note: The third step to adding an arc figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar arco: haga clic donde desee que termine el arco.

translation.note: The first step to adding an ellipse figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar elipse: pulse el botón del ratón en la parte superior izquierda de la elipse.

translation.note: The second step to adding an ellipse figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar elipse: arrastre el cursor del ratón a la parte inferior derecha de la elipse y suéltelo.

translation.note: The only step to adding a label. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user. The user can also hit the I or O keys to make the label switch direction (between input and output).
translation.variant: Agregar etiqueta: haga clic para colocar la etiqueta. Puede pulsar E o S antes de hacer clic parar cambiar la dirección de la etiqueta como entrada o salida.

translation.note: The first step to adding a microblock. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar micro bloque: haga clic para seleccionar una ubicación para el micro bloque.

translation.note: The first step to adding a rectangle. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar rectángulo: pulse el botón del ratón en la parte superior izquierda del rectángulo.

translation.note: The second step to adding a rectangle figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar rectángulo: arrastre el cursor hasta la parte inferior derecha del rectángulo y, a continuación, suéltelo.

translation.note: The first step to adding a text figure. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar texto: haga clic en el lugar donde desee agregar el texto

translation.note: The first step to adding a wire. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar alambre: pulse el botón izquierdo del ratón para establecer una ubicación de inicio.

translation.note: The second step to adding a wire. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar alambre: arrastre el ratón para dibujar una línea. Suelte el botón izquierdo para parar. Haga clic con el botón secundario para agregar uniones.

translation.note: The first step to adding a polygon. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar polígono: pulse el botón izquierdo del ratón para establecer una ubicación de inicio.

translation.note: The second step to adding a polygon. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar polígono: arrastre el ratón para dibujar el polígono. Suelte el botón izquierdo para parar. Haga clic con el botón secundario para agregar uniones.

translation.note: The first step to adding a line. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar línea: pulse el botón izquierdo del ratón para establecer una ubicación de inicio.

translation.note: The second step to adding a line. This text appears on the status bar to aid the user.
translation.variant: Agregar línea: arrastre el ratón para dibujar la línea. Suelte el botón izquierdo para parar. Haga clic con el botón secundario para agregar uniones.
Agregar imagen: haga clic para colocar la imagen en el lienzo.

translation.note: the name of a titled border on the find/replace dialog that allows to specify what things to search.
This is the name of an option on the find/replace dialog to search microblocks.
The is the name of an option on the find/replace dialog to search labels
The is the name of an option on the find/replace dialog to search text figures
This is the name of an option on the find/replace dialog to search inside Custom microblocks.
The name of a menu that lists the users favorite templates
Creates a symbol from the selected items and adds it to the favorites list.
Displays a dialog allowing the user to add and remove items from the favorites as well as change their order
Title for the dialog where the user adds and removes items (and re-orders) to/from favorites.
This is the tooltip for a favorites template menu item when the file is missing
Title for a dialog that edits the properties of favorite symbol.
The 'name' field in a dialog that edits the properties of favorite symbol.
The 'description' field in a dialog that edits the properties of favorite symbol.
Button text to move the selected items in a list up
Button text to move the selected items in a list up
Tooltip for a button that adds new favorites
tooltip for a button that removes favorite symbols from a list.
Dialog title for removing favorites.
Message that asks the user if they want to delete the file for the favorite.
tooltip for a button that allows you to edit the way the selected favorite appears on the menu. This is mainly the name and description.
translation.variant: Editar propiedades del menú de favoritos

translation.note: Tooltip for a button that opens the selected favorite symbol in the main view for editing.
translation.variant: Abrir favorito seleccionado en la vista principal para modificarlo

translation.note: Title for the simulator setup dialog
Title for the simulator setup dialog
The options for file operations in the simulator
The menu for setting parameters for the simulator
Title for the simulator setup dialog
The menu for running simulations
Menu item to start the simulator with the current control program
Menu item to stop the simulator
Menu item to make the simulator run a single cycle (step).
Menu item to make the simulator run in fast forward mode (only while you're pressing the button).
Tooltip for the toolbar button to make the simulator run in fast forward mode (only while you're pressing the button).
translation.variant: Procese continuamente la simulación por pasos mediante ciclos de ejecución

translation.note: Menu item to quit the simulator
Message show to the user to ask them if they wish to save changes made to values while they were running the simulator
translation.variant: ¿Desea grabar los cambios que usted efectuó al ejecutar la simulación?

translation.note: This is the title of the dialog that asks if you want to save your simulation values
Title for a group of calendar-related controls
header for a field to specify the simulated time
header for a field to specify the simulated date
header for a field that shows the simulated day (based on the date)
Title for a group of communications-related controls.
checkbox for enabling/disabling (simulated) communications.
Header for a field in a table, so it needs to be an abbreviated version
Title for a group of controls related to how time is simulated. This refers to how long each simulated step is and how often to make those steps
header for a field that specifies how often to step. The mm:ss is to let the user know its in minutes, seconds format (2 digits apiece).
Header for a field that specifies how much time each simulated step represents. The mm:ss is to let the user know its in minutes, seconds format (2 digits apiece).

translation.variant: No puede ejecutar el simulador con errores de compilación.
translation.note: This error message appears when you attempt to simulate a control program that is not compilable.
Error message to user telling them that a microblock value could not be set.
translation.variant: El valor ''{0}'' para el micro bloque ''{1}'' no se ha podido establecer.

translation.note: Error message to user telling them that an EIKON file couldn't be converted to a LogicBuilder file.
translation.variant: {0} tenía errores y no se ha podido convertir. Debe convertir este archivo manualmente.

translation.note: Provider row simulation index

Label that shows that a value can both be read and written to

Label that shows that a value can both be read and written to
This button makes selected rows move down in the PMT table.
This button makes selected rows move up in the PMT table.

Ha dejado el ID de programa de Lonworks en blanco.\n¿Seguro que desea continuar?
No volver a mostrar esta advertencia.
ID de programa no válido: ''{0}''. El ID del programa debe tener 8 caracteres o menos.
ID de programa no válido: ''{0}''. El ID del programa debe comenzar con un "8" o un "9" y debe estar en formato SPID.
El valor ''{0}'' se ha especificado como SPID. Debe ser un valor hexadecimal con una longitud de 16 caracteres y no de ''{1}''.
El valor ''{0}'' contiene caracteres no válidos. El ID de programa con formato SPID solo puede contener caracteres hexadecimales.
Nombre de variable de red no válido: ''{0}''. Los nombres deben tener una longitud de entre 1 y 16 caracteres.
